1: <pb/><t>A d'a sti' a a' d'a yol yic Babilonia, on̈ em c'ojan ayic ix co naancot Sion, ix on̈ oc' b'ian.</t>
2: <t>Ix cac'q'ue locan te' arpa d'a sc'ab' te' tac'u ay d'a sti' a a' chi'.</t>
3: <t>A eb' ix on̈ ic'anb'at icha d'a preso, ix b'uchvaj eb' d'ayon̈, ix yalan eb' icha tic: B'itanan̈ec d'a tzalajc'olal, a sb'ital Sion tze b'itej d'ayon̈, xchi eb'.</t>
4: <t>¿Tom ol co b'itej b'it yic Jehová d'a lum ch'oc chon̈ab'il? xco chi.</t>
5: <t>Tato sb'at satc'olal Jerusalén vuuj, satocab' sjelanil in vach' c'ab' tic in chalan te' varpa.</t>
6: <t>Tato man̈xo naanoc Jerusalén vuuj, tato man̈xa pax in gana d'ay d'a yichan̈ pax tas snib'ej in c'ool, canocab' lotznaj vac' d'a in joom, yic vach' man̈xo ol yal-laj in b'itani.</t>
7: <t>Mamin Jehová, nacot eb' aj Edom, yujto ayic ix yamchaj chon̈ab' Jerusalén, ix yal eb' icha tic: Pojequemi, pojequemi, masanto scheclaj cimientoal yich, xchi eb'.</t>
8: <t>Ex aj Babilonia, ol ex satpaxeloc. Te vach' yic mach ol ac'anec' spac chucal tas ix on̈ eyutej.</t>
9: <t>Te vach' yic mach ol yaman eb' eyuninal, ol smac'anpoj sjolom eb' d'a spatictac q'uen q'ueen.</t>
